FuncDef:
The prepaid-profile command sets a pre-paid profile for a service policy template.
The undo prepaid-profile cancels the pre-paid profile for the service policy template.
By default, the pre-paid function is not allowed for a service policy template.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the pre-paid profile.
The value is a string and it ranges from 1 to 31.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command configures whether the pre-paid function is allowed for a service policy template.
Configuration Impact
The service will do the pre-paid process according to the parameters in the pre-paid profile.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
